paper_title: Conformal Ricci solitons on generalized ($κ, μ$)-space forms
abstract: In this paper, we study conformal Ricci solitons and conformal gradient Ricci solitons on generalized ($κ,μ$)-space forms. The conditions for the solitons to be shrinking, steady, and expanding are derived in terms of conformal pressure p. We show under what conditions a Ricci semi-symmetric generalized ($κ,μ$)-space form equipped with a conformal Ricci soliton forms an Einstein manifold.
